p: A robust, correctly structured dataset was created to allow the differentiation of the Ae. aegypti, Ae. albopictus and C. quinquefasciatus species. In addition, differentiation of males and females was conducted as described in a previous study[ 41]. A model was developed to classify the mosquitoes into six different classes according to gender and species. At this stage, our work does not intend to classify other species and non-mosquitoes images.
